title: Coloring by exposure
body: It is now possible to select "Exposure" coloring scheme to color by average surface exposure at given position.

title: New Designer functionality
body: New "Designer" tab was added that supports making manual mutations to an antibody sequence while monitoring sequence properties in real time.

title: Redesign & Improved navigation
body: New landing page was added, the left navigation panel was removed and replaced with a more streamlined top navigation bar.

title: Help button added
body: A help button was added to the top right of the screen. Click it to learn more about the page or to learn how to report any issues.
